description: The GA-08 Regional Transport Office (Margao RTO) functions as the office of the Assistant Director of Transport for South Goa. It handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Salcete taluka. Margao is the commercial capital of Goa and the headquarters of South Goa district.
address: Assistant Director of Transport, South Goa District Collectorate Building (Matanhy Saldanha Administrative Complex), Margao, Salcete, Goa
